items.title: Insta360 X4 Air Is A Lighter, More Affordable 360-Degree Action Camera
items.description: The Insta360 X4 Air looks a lot like its popular X-series 360-degree camera siblings but is lighter, and costs less than the flagship Insta360 X5.

items.title: AI And Fitness Tracking Can Help Us Live Longer
items.description: AI-enhanced tracking reinforces simple truth: regular movement and muscle-building drive healthy longevity more than trendy therapies.

items.title: Why The Old Way Of Buying Services Won’t Work For AI
items.description: There is nothing more difficult, nothing more dangerous, than introducing a new order of things. And that’s exactly what AI is doing.

items.title: Gmail Passwords Confirmed Within 183 Million Account Infostealer Leak
items.description: As news of 183 million credentials from infostealer logs being leaked spreads, Gmail users have been confirmed as caught firmly in the crosshairs.

items.title: NYT Connections: Today’s Answers Explained (Wednesday, October 29, #871)
items.description: Not sure what today's NYT Connections answers are all about? Find out just what the different words in today's grid mean and how they fit together.
